data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lyons And Martin Avery Snyder, William G. (2013): The Genus Pustulatirus Vermeij and Snyder, 2006 (Gastropoda: Fasciolariidae: Peristerniinae) in the Western Atlantic, with Descriptions of Three New Species. Zootaxa 3636 (1): 35-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.283572
